name: Wark & Wimble
description:
When mysterious invaders come crashing into Wark & Wimble’s forest home, they must work together to save their species from extinction. Avoid deadly lasers, flamethrowers, and soldiers while you save your comrades and their eggs in this block pushing puzzle game.



81 Puzzles

9 Unique worlds, each with their own graphics, music and obstacles

3 Puzzle Types - Hatch an egg, Jail-break, and blow up an enemy base

Undo your mistakes! Back up to any previous move instead of starting over

Full touch/keyboard/mouse/controller support. Play the game how you like!



Eat food, hatch eggs and solve puzzles in this 2D puzzle game. Help the characters arrange the objects while avoiding deadly traps and enemies.
